oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Benjamin Lincoln
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Full length portrait of Benjamin Lincoln (1733-1810), in uniform, leaning against a cannon. One hand rests on the cannon with an unidentified document and the other hand it positioned on his hip. In the background are figures holding a flag.
General in the Continental Army during the Revolutionary War and Lieutenant Governor of Massachusetts, 1788-89.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Lincoln, Benjamin, 1733-1810
